MSG.ShortText: The expected task type is "ServerTask" but it is "$TYPE$"
The server task $TASK_ID$ was started but there is no job for it.
MSG.Description: The server task $TASK_ID$ was started but there is no job to be performed.

MSG.ShortText: A Servertask should execute a job but is already executing another job.
The Servertask Coordinator cannot be allocated. No more heap memory available.
There is not enough heap memory to register a new servertask.
Available Servertasks: $UINT4$
Job $JOB_ID$ ($DESCRIPTION$) [$JOB_STATE$] WaitingT$JOB_WAITING_TASKID$ Result=$JOB_RESULT$
Job Type: '$DESCRIPTION$'
Not enough heap memory
Servertask Info: because $DESCRIPTION$
The servertask T$JOB_TASKID$ with index #$INDEX$ could not be released.
The servertask T$JOB_TASKID$ is not registered properly.
The errorlist is not empty but result is OK after executing the job.
INTERNAL PROGRAMMING ERROR: $DESCRIPTION$
The job has state $STATE$ but this is not expected.
The waiting task is different between job and caller.
Auxiliary Files can not be dropped asynchronously.
A job in the joblist has an unexpected state: $JOB_STATE$
A caller should wait for a job but all jobs are confirmed.
Permanently reserved $TASKS_WANTED$ servertasks for '$DESCRIPTION$'.
Server T$SERVER_TASK_ID$ Id$SERVER_TASK_INDEX$ $SERVER_TASK_KIND$: '$DESCRIPTION$'
ServerTask Coordinator: Max=$MAX_SERVER_TASKS$, Used=$SERVER_TASKS_USED$
ServertaskControl #$SERVER_TASK_INDEX$, $SRVTASK_ASSIGNED$, $SRVTASKS_RESERVED$
Request file $FILENO$ could not be found
Table key $KEYASHEX$ not found in request file $FILENO$
Temporary file $FILENO$ could not be found
MSG.Description: During the computation of table statistics in the course of an 'UPDATE STATISTICS' statement, a serious error occurred causing the statement to abort.

MSG.Description: The following internal backup or restore values are outputted: - Does it concern an “AUTOMATIC log backup” job? - Which backup or restore task has just run? - Which backup media ID and which backup volume ID were just used?

MSG.ShortText: SelfTest of Servertasks generated error '$ERRORTEXT$' $NO$
$BYTES_USED$ bytes are still allocated after the job execution.
MSG.Description: A job must only use memory via the server task allocator while it is executed by the server task. If the job is terminated, then it must not use further server task memory.

MSG.ShortText: The RedoLogReader stopped with e_cancelled
